pr_title: Differentiate the username/password for pulling base image with Jib

timeline.bodyText: Why the base prefix here? Just curious
timeline.author: gastaldi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -44,5 +45,17 @@
      * Custom labels to add to the generated image
      */
     @ConfigItem
-    Map<String, String> labels;
+    public Map<String, String> labels;
+
+    /**
+     * The username to use to authenticate with the registry used to pull the base JVM image
+     */
+    @ConfigItem
+    public Optional<String> baseRegistryUsername;
+
+    /**
+     * The password to use to authenticate with the registry used to pull the base JVM image
+     */
+    @ConfigItem
+    public Optional<String> baseRegistryPassword;

replies.bodyText:
It's not great for sure, but I added it to keep consistency with the baseJvmImage and baseNativeImage properties.
Does that sound good?
replies.author: geoand

replies.bodyText: I'd just go with registryUsername and registryPassword then. The base in this case doesn't make much sense, I think
replies.author: gastaldi

replies.bodyText: Nevermind my previous comment, I see there is an username and password in the container-image config
replies.author: gastaldi
